verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Thy kingdom come
Thy will be done
In earth as it is in Heaven
Give us this day
Our daily bread
And forgive us as we do others.
Thy kingdom come
Thy will be done
In earth as it is in Heaven
Give us this day
Our daily bread
And forgive us as we do others.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For thy kingdom, oh Lord, is not of this world.
It's foundations are sure not upon the earth
And we enter therein only by the spirit and thy word.
And we see it from afar only by your word.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Thy kingdom come
Thy will be done
In earth as it is in Heaven
Give us this day
Our daily bread
And forgive us as we do others.
